p: After removing low-quality sequences, a total of 288,342,450, 250,073,062, 289,224,844 and 277,834,922 clean reads with greater than 91.91% of Q30 were obtained in MM_F, MM_L, ww_F and ww_L, respectively. Approximately 86.10 to 92.89% of the reads were successfully mapped to the Ovis aries reference genome (TableÂ 1).
